title: I'll probably start taking Accutane next week
body:
After many different attempts at clearing up my HS and my severe cystic acne, my dermatologist is pushing for me to take the drug again. I rejected it twice because I was worried about the side effects but now I feel like I should just go for it. It's a super powerful drug that completely eradicates all cysts and acne on your body by stopping your body from producing lipids on the skin or something. 

My main concern is that there is a lengthy list of potential side effects such as depression, psychosis, organ damage, blindness, or death, but I guess lots of medications have some scary side effects and with the constant monitoring and check ins I should be fine (they would want a monthly blood test.

Wish me luck, I want to one day not be embarrassed by my skin or suffer from the painfully bleeding cysts all the time.
